meanings.definition: One of a thousand equal parts.
meanings.sent1: I ate a thousandth of the cake.
meanings.sent2: The thousandth piece of the puzzle was missing.
meanings.sent3: He found the thousandth grape in the bunch and pretended it was a treasure.
meanings.sent4: In the vast desert, each grain of sand felt like a thousandth of a larger picture.
meanings.sent5: The thousandth drop of rain finally fell, ending the drought.

meanings.definition: The ordinal number of 1000 in a series.
meanings.sent1: She finished in the thousandth position in the race.
meanings.sent2: The thousandth page of the book contained a surprising twist.
meanings.sent3: The thousandth customer of the day received a special gift.
meanings.sent4: As the clock struck midnight for the thousandth time, he made a wish.
meanings.sent5: The thousandth star in the sky seemed to shine the brightest.
